beer.beer_description:
Summer Ale was brewed with long Aussie summers in mind, but can be enjoyed all year round.
This hot-weather favourite is loaded with fruity, crisp characters, and has minimal bitterness. The hop aromas of melon and passionfruit add a pleasant floral character, and complement the subtle fruitiness on the front-palate. The finish is crisp, dry, and as refreshing than diving straight into the pool on a hot day.

Summer Ale was brewed with long Aussie summers in mind, but can be enjoyed all year round.
This hot-weather favourite is loaded with fruity, crisp characters, and has minimal bitterness. The finish is crisp, dry, and as refreshing than diving straight into the pool on a hot day.

items.badge_description: As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 5 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 45 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 140 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 29.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 245 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 50! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: It's time for Summer! It's that time of year where you hit the beach and crack open your favorite Summer brew! That's at least 35 different Summer beers! Try 5 more for Level 8!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 75 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 16!

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 240 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 49!
